sources.title: The Trigger Trio
sources.description: Rancher Brent (Cornelius Keefe) has some infected cattle. He has the brands changed and then has them put on the Evans ranch, With the law requiring the entire herds to be destroyed, he gets Larry Smith (Ralph Byrd) to help him illegally drive his and the Evans' cattle across the state line. Lullaby (Max Terhune) learns of the scheme and tries to stop Larry

sources.title: The Trigger Trio (1937) THE THREE MESQUITEERS
sources.description:
Stars: Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, Ralph Byrd
 Director: William Witney

 Rancher Brent has some infected cattle. He has the brands changed and then has them put on the Evans ranch, With the law requiring the entire herds to be destroyed, he gets Larry Smith to help him illegally drive his and the Evans' cattle across the state line. Lullaby learns of the scheme and tries to stop Larry.

metadata.Plot: Rancher Brent has some infected cattle. He has the brands changed and then has them put on the Evans ranch, With the law requiring the entire herds to be destroyed, he gets Larry Smith to help him illegally drive his and the Evans' cattle across the state line. Lullaby learns of the scheme and tries to stop Larry.
metadata.Writer: Oliver Drake, Joseph F. Poland, Houston Branch
metadata.Actors: Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, Ralph Byrd
